title: Brandy Crusta
body: * 2 oz brandy (1757 Brandy)* 1 oz lemon juice* 1⁄2 oz ginger syrup Ginger beer* 1 slice candied ginger* 1 lemon peel garnish* sugar crust rimCrust the rim of an old fashioned glass with sugar. Mix all ingredients in a shaker, strain carefully into the old fashioned glass, so as not to disturb the sugar rim. Garnish with a lemon peel and ginger slice.
